Dando la bienvenida a la realidad aumentada con juegos retro en donde te presentamos una nueva forma de jugar tus juegos favoritos de la infancia en donde tu serás el protagonista.

A travez de Oculus Rift y una pistola electronica podrás derrotar a todos los Space Invaders.

Nos encontramos con el reto de desarrollar una pistola electrónica y por medio del uso de sensores coordinar el videojuego.

Con este proyecto nos sentimos orgulloso de presentarte un videojuego completo y divertido

Inspiration

We were challenged by Briko to develop such app.

How it works

NodeJS server for website and compilation, Ace IDE to edit, Chrome App to load program to Briko.

Challenges I ran into

NodeJS:

  • Calling command line applications
  • Compiling to avr specifically for the Briko using avr-gcc
  • Sending compiled programs to browser ### Website:
  • Integrating IDE
  • Communication with the Chrome app ### Chrome app:
  • Communication with the browser
  • Debugging ## Accomplishments that I'm proud of
  • Good times were had. ## What I learned
  • More NodeJS
  • Lots about arduino compilers and serial protocols
  • Lots about Chrome api ## What's next for Briko onlide IDE+compiler
  • Polishing for the Chrome extension and a Firefox extension

"We do art" it's a group of artistic digital exhibitions that are meant to close the gap between humans and art, all of the exhibitions displayed here must be of available for everyone that has a computer, a phone or a tablet and an Internet connection, all exhibitions must involve human interaction so that everyone becomes art.

The first digital exhibition that we are going to perform is an exquisite corpse, this were created during surrealism times, usually a group of friends will get together and each one will write a sentence in a piece of paper that then will be folded and passed on to the next friend, at the end they will read the poem. Now we want to create the poem of humanity, we want to analyze the sentences that the persons create to find out what the world is talking about, what we are feeling and where we are going.

Se buscaba crear una app donde las personas interesadas puedan suscribirse y recibir notificaciones de lo que deseen; eventos culturales en el estado, becas, intercambios estudiantiles y otras convocatorias. De esta manera las personas interesadas tendrán más oportunidades a su alcance, y evitarán el perderlas por no enterarse a tiempo de su existencia. Además podrán calificar cada uno de estos y generar estadísticas en base a esto. Con esto, se espera que los eventos que promueva el gobierno sean de mayor calidad y para el gusto de la población.
